DOC.brief_summary: Different type retainer use assure stability orthodontic treatment . The aim study clinical radiographic comparison evaluation two common type lingual fix retainer health periodontium . The participant study examine clinically radiographically completion orthodontic treatment 6-month-period . The result study analyzed Mann-whitney independent t-test .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Effect Two Types Fixed Retainers Health Gums
